For questions and error reports please use support@mailapps.me, but if everything is just fine, remember to rate us 5 stars.

Check out our new interface! We’ve refreshed the design, added functionality, and put a ton of love into every feature.

— Quick access to important actions. We moved the main menu below for greater convenience when working on big screens.
